LanguageData.AncientExostriderCannon.label: ancient exostrider cannon
LanguageData.AncientExostriderCannon.description: The remains of the back-mounted energy cannon of a massive, ancient exostrider mechanoid.
LanguageData.AncientExostriderHead.label: ancient exostrider head
LanguageData.AncientExostriderHead.description: The remains of the head of a massive, ancient exostrider mechanoid. It was blasted by some kind of high-energy weapon.
LanguageData.AncientExostriderLeg.label: ancient exostrider leg
LanguageData.AncientExostriderLeg.description: The remains of the leg of a massive, ancient exostrider mechanoid.
LanguageData.AncientExostriderRemains.label: ancient exostrider midsection
LanguageData.AncientExostriderRemains.description:
The remains of a massive, ancient exostrider war mechanoid. Long ago, some high-energy weapon shattered the body and fused the parts into an almost-solid mass.

In its guts, it looks like there is a still-functional transponder. If you could extract the transponder, you could decrypt it to gather valuable information.

The mech's incendiary weapon cells are intact but unstable, and will likely detonate after you do some damage.
LanguageData.AncientExostriderRemains.comps.CompProxi:
Passing near the remains of an ancient exostrider mechanoid, {PAWN_nameDef} noticed an (*Reward)intact transponder(/Reward) inside.

If you could get the transponder, you could read valuable information from it. The massive mech is smashed and fused into a solid piece. You must destroy it to retrieve the transponder.

Be careful - the incendiary weapon cells look (*Threat)unstable(/Threat) and will likely detonate after you do some damage.
LanguageData.AncientExostriderRemains.comps.CompLeavi: A {LEAVINGS1_label} has been left behind after an explosion. It can be decrypted at a research bench.\n\nSelect a colonist and right-click it to decrypt it.
